```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Libraries 
library(dplyr) 
library(leaflet)
```

```{r, eval=TRUE}

StKevinsIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://img.icons8.com/fluency/2x/cross.png",
  iconWidth = 50,
  iconHeight = 50
)

content <- paste(sep = "<br/>", "<b><a href='http://www.stkevinsdublin.ie'>St Kevins</a></b>", "Home to Saints and Scholars", "and refuge of sinners")

StKevinsLatLong <- data.frame(
  Latitude = c(53.332786),
  Longitude = c(-6.267576))

StKevinsLatLong %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude,
             icon = StKevinsIcon) %>% 
    addPopups(-6.267576, 53.333, content,
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE, closeOnClick = FALSE )  ) 
```
